sourcesContent:
<form ngForm>
    <label>job field</label>
    <select type="text"  name="field" *ngFor="let field of fieldsList">
        <option value=""></option>{{field}}</select>
    <label>job area</label>
    <select type="text" [(ngModel)]="area" name="area"   ></select>
    <button type="submit" (click)="filter()">search</button>
</form>
